00012 /** \file
00013  \brief Dlopen()'d data generators need to implement the functions defined herein
00014 */
00015 
00016 #ifndef __SIMDL_DATASOURCE_H
00017 #define __SIMDL_DATASOURCE_H
00018 
00019 #ifdef __cplusplus
00020 extern "C" {
00021 #endif //__cplusplus
00022 
00023 /// Get a human-friendly name for this generator
00024 const char *simdl_name();
00025 
00026 /// Initialise the data generator
00027 /** \return 0 for success, 1 for failure
00028       \param gen opaque data generator
00029       \param seed intialisation seed. implementation specific
00030 */
00031 int simdl_create(void **gen, const char *seed);
00032 
00033 /// Shut down the data generator
00034 void simdl_destroy(void *gen);
00035 
00036 /// Get a value for the specified PID
00037 /** \return number of values created
00038       \param mode the mode of this request
00039       \param PID the PID this is for
00040       \param gen opaque data generator
00041       \param A,B,C,D four values to fill
00042 */
00043 int simdl_getvalue(void *gen, unsigned int mode, unsigned int PID,
00044         unsigned int *A, unsigned int *B, unsigned int *C, unsigned int *D);
00045 
00046 /// Called whenever the sim is idle. Do not block more than timems milliseconds
00047 /** \return anything other than zero is considered a condition which means we must exit
00048  */
00049 int simdl_idle(void *gen, int timems);
00050 
00051 /// Called to find out if there are any error conditions set, and what they are
00052 /** \param errorcodes populate this with the error codes currently set
00053     \param num_codes number of errorcodes available to be populated
00054     \param mil set to indicate whether MIL is on
00055     \return -1 on error. >=0 num error codes. num_codes+1 to indicate "more than there was space for"
00056 */
00057 int simdl_geterrorcodes(void *gen, unsigned int *errorcodes, int num_codes, int *mil);
00058 
00059 /// Called to signify that error codes should be cleared
00060 /** \return -1 on error, 0 on success */
00061 int simdl_clearerrorcodes(void *gen);
00062 
00063 #ifdef __cplusplus
00064 }
00065 #endif //__cplusplus
00066 
00067 #endif //__SIMDL_DATASOURCE_H
